title: Dua to say in the last 10 nights of Ramadan (Laylatul Qadr) | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: second question of Abdullah from Canada saying that is there in a specific dua that the Prophet used to say Assam for the odd numbers of last night's 10 nights of ramadan dances no there's no specific door neither for the odd or even the only hadith we have is the hadith of mother Aisha may Allah be pleased with her and she said o prophet of Allah what should I say if I were to identify the night of Qatar so if I know that tonight is Leila - what should I say the Prophet said that is some say a llama in the car for one to hit Bulava far for any oh Allah you are most forgiving you love pardoning so forgive me and pardon me so this is a dua for the whole last ten nights you say as many as you wish and this is highly recommended
